project_des: An interactive music-themed web application for discovering and exploring songs.
long_des: This music web app was inspired by a tutorial from MSquare's YouTube channel on building a music project.

features.feature_1: Has English, Japan, Korea and Myanmar songs.

project_des: A portfolio site showcasing projects and skills in web development.
long_des: This personal portfolio highlights expertise in frontend development through a clean and modern design. It serves as a showcase for completed projects, technical skills, and achievements, emphasizing simplicity and usability.

features.feature_3: Clean navigation and UI for better usability.
